title: Insurance Essentials
description: Why Tenant Insurance is a must-have for renters.

content.title: Liability Protection
content.text: Tenant insurance doesn't just cover your clothes and furniture; it protects you if you accidentally cause damage to the building (like a kitchen fire) or if someone is injured in your home.

quiz.question: Does your landlord's insurance cover your personal belongings?
quiz.explanation: No. The landlord's insurance only covers the building itself, not your personal items or your liability.
